I got it working with Daemon Tools Lite. Maybe uninstall DT Pro and follow my instructions:
Yes, thanks to other commenters I got singleplayer working.
Hereâ€™s what you should do:
1. Install latest Daemon Tools Lite.
2. Download the latest Y.A.S.U. from ......files.cdmediaworld.com/YASU_1.6_9040.zip
3. Unrar in your Daemon Tools Lite directory.
4. Close Daemon Tools Lite and rename dtlite.exe to daemon.exe
5. Start Daemon Tools Lite by starting daemon.exe
6. Mount Medal Of Honor Limited Edition MULTi3 CLONEDVD-P2P
7. Start Y.A.S.U. and click Cloak
8. Start Medal Of Honor
9. It WILL say something along the lines of â€œUse the real disk, not a backupâ€
10. Click OK.
11. Click Uncloak in Y.A.S.U.
12. Click Cloak in Y.A.S.U.
13. Start Medal of Honor
14. Play!

4. Close Daemon Tools Lite and rename dtlite.exe to daemon.exe

5. Start Daemon Tools Lite by starting daemon.exe

6. Mount Medal Of Honor Limited Edition MULTi3 CLONEDVD-P2P (yes the .mdx file)

7. Start Y.A.S.U. and click Cloak

8. Start Medal Of Honor (autoplay and install it)

9. It WILL say something along the lines of Ã¢â‚¬Å“Use the real disk, not a backupÃ¢â‚¬Â

10. Click OK.

11. download and replace the crack file from 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5881346/Medal.of.Honor.MULTI3.Limited_Edition_CRACK_ONLY

to your game directory..

Delete The Paul.dll After Extracting Files To MOH Binaries Folder... Also Make Sure The Image Is Mounted On Daemon Tools Lite It Does Work..

12. Click Uncloak in Y.A.S.U.

13. Click Cloak in Y.A.S.U.

14. Start Medal of Honor

15. Play!

works fine, only thing is if you have a high DPI mouse like mine you might want to edit the config located in your documents folder under metal of honer..
you can edit the MOHAInput file by right clicking on it and hitting: edit then navigate to the line that says "MouseSensitivity=35.000000" and change it to 10.. 35!!!no wonder it was so sensitive!! you could play wiht the setting l,ower or higher. i found 10 to be perfect for my dethadder.. 
Also you can play this in Dx10 mode if you open the file called, " MOHAEngine" and navigate to the line "AllowD3D10=FALSE" and make it True..
Essentially you can make a lot of changes to the games video config using this method under the "[system settings]" category in the MOHAEngine config file..
